text: My mom's been married three times my dad has been married a lot. I didn't really see my dad that much.
author: Skeet Ulrich

text: I want to make my music and be a happy woman, a good wife, a good mom and one day hopefully have a child of my own.
author: LeAnn Rimes

text: My dad is a very quick-witted, sarcastic, dry, humorous guy, whereas my mom's very silly, and that side of the family is very musical.
author: Tim Heidecker

text: Once my mom passed away, I have nobody to answer to. It's great.
author: Jessica Hahn

text: My mom really instilled in me that I'm beautiful and I can do anything, and I echo that now with my own girls.
author: Jennie Garth
